main.name: Tawfik KHORB

main.bio: My name is Tawfik, I'm an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, and a passion for coding I am a Full Stack Web Developer. I worked as a Data Analyst and Scrum Master for mdinashop company. Currently I'm working as Sap SD consultant at ONEE.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, develop a website or anything else.

Here I took my high School Degree with a Physics Specialty and improved my English language by participating the scholarship of Access Program and get a certificate give by the USA Embassy.

testimonials.text: I have worked with Tawfik. From the start of the project, through to completion, Warren supported us and exceeded our expectations in every way. Not only was our experience personal and friendly, his ability to identify and present our key messages in an imaginative and creative way gave us a huge amount of confidence in him. In many ways Warren understood our client's website needs better than we did and he complimented our vision perfectly. He's reliable, professional and easy to work with. I canâ€™t recommend him highly enough and we look forward to continuing our working relationship together.
